title: Red Cabbage Salad with Figs and Gorgonzola

ingredients.content: 300 g red cabbage, cut in pieces
30 g dried figs, cut in pieces (3 cm)

preparations.content: Place apple, shallot and cabbage in mixing bowl then chop <b>8 sec/speed 4.5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add figs, maple syrup, vinegar, cranberry juice, oil, salt and pepper then mix <b>5 sec//speed 2<b>.
Add rocket and Gorgonzola then transfer to a large bowl. Mix gently with spatula then serve immediately.
